notifications.addPolicySuccess: Have been successfuly assigned to the instance.
notifications.addPolicyPartialSuccess: Have been partially assigned to the instance.
notifications.addPolicyError: Errors occurred while trying to assign access.
notifications.getAccessGroupsError: The list of access groups can’t be retrieved at this time. Refresh the page, or try again later.
notifications.getAuthzResourceError: The resource data can’t be retrieved at this time. Refresh the page, or try again later.
notifications.getPubAccessGroupSettingError: The setting for the public access group can’t be retrieved at this time. Refresh the page, or try again later.
notifications.getServiceError: The roles for the public access group can’t be retrieved at this time. Refresh the page, or try again later.
notifications.getHeaderAccountErrorSubtitle: The account information can't be retrived at this time. Refresh the page, or try again later.

accessGroups.heading: Assign access to access groups
accessGroups.publicAccessToggleLabel: Do you want to enable public access to this resource? Learn more.
accessGroups.selectorHelpText: Select an access group to give all entities of the group access to this resource.

roles.heading: Access
roles.noAvailableRoles: Looks like you don’t have access to assign a role for this resource. Contact your account owner or the administrator for this resource to update your access.
roles.helpText: Select roles to assign to define the level of access.
roles.platformRolesInfo: These roles enable actions to be performed on platform resources, such as creating an instance, connecting instances to apps, and assigning user access. Select all that apply.
roles.serviceRolesInfo: These roles allow access for using the service and performing service API calls. Each role is customized by the selected service. Select all that apply. Refer to the service's documentation for more details.
roles.customRolesInfo: These roles are created by administrators in the account to customize how access is assigned to the service. Click the Actions for role icon to review what actions are mapped to this role.

confirmationModal.heading: Review access assignments to {{resourceDisplayName}}
confirmationModal.helpText: Review the following access group policies to ensure you're assigning the right level of access.

publicAccessModal.heading: Assign access access to the public access group
publicAccessModal.checkboxLabel: Are you sure that you want to allow public access to this resource by adding an access policy to the public access group?

genericRetrieveError: Unable to retrieve data at this time. Refresh the page, or try again later.
genericCreatePolicyError: Unable to create the access policy at this time. Refresh the page, or try again later.
